title: I am the owner of my club, but i can't see it
body:
I am the owner of my club but i can't see it and the relative in-game tag. The other members continue to see me, the club and the tag in game.

IGN: Nacho244
CLUB NAME: Autism Without Borders
CLUB TAG: AWB
SERVER: EUW

Thank you for the eventual help and assistance.

replies.body:
i have the same problem

Username: keanu161
Club name: BLACKWATER MERC.
Club tag: none
Server: EUWest
I had to do a little poking around in the back, but you should be able to see that club now! Hit me back up if not though.

I have the same issue, help please!

Username: Hazzypurpll
Club name: Dem Dupes
CLub Tag: Dup√©s
Server: EUW

Thanks for any help!

I have a similar issue and figure it'd be better to just respond here than make a new thread. I used the setting to make it so my club isn't shown in game or on the loading screen and I want that to stay as is, but it doesn't show my club chat in the client at all now and when I go to the club section of my profile it acts like I'm not in a club at all, despite my friends still being in it and me being the creator of it.
Club name: A Bunch Of Stupid People
Club tag: ABOSP
-poke poke nudge nudge- Aaaaaaand there we go! Do me a favor and check for that club, you should be able to see it now!

Could you help me too? I'm having the same issue.
Club Name: AXIBA
Club tag: AXIBA
IGN: Ahoy Ahoy
Thanks <3
I can see and manage the club now, yay! :D Is there any way I can set it to not show the club and tag to others at the loading screen and in game now?

same tags not showing up either in game or in chat.
Club name(s): Ahri The Nine Tailed Fox , Death Mark!!!
Club tags: Charm, <Zed3
It works perfectly now. Thank you very much, you're awesome.
We are a simple no-profit organization.
